call_title: Ergo PoW Blockchain - Weekly Update & AMA - September 26th 2024

decisions.decision: Skip next week's AMA due to Twitter spaces with Nervos
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.context: Scheduling conflict with Twitter spaces on peer-to-peer economy
decisions.quote: next week I think maybe it's better to skip the AMA because at the same time we will have Twitter spaces with Nervos folks

decisions.decision: No AMA next week, Twitter spaces with Nervos instead
decisions.speaker: kushti
decisions.quote: And so once again, folks, there will be no AMA next week. So next week we will have Twitter spaces with Nervos folks on blockchain powered peer-to-peer economy

commitments.commitment: Preparing writings about 6.0 for miners and soft forking capabilities
commitments.quote: also preparing some writings about 6.0, so what miners will work on, and actually some soft forking capabilities which will be used in this wording

commitments.commitment: Start new education initiative after October
commitments.quote: maybe from November. After October, we will start some new education initiative

commitments.commitment: Post physical swag items on MewFinance later today
commitments.quote: I should be able to post a couple things later today. So look for some physical swag on MewFinance

commitments.commitment: Talk to Cornell Blockchain group about ErgoHack
commitments.quote: I think it's October 2nd or 3rd or 4th, I'm going to use that opportunity to let them know about ErgoHack

commitments.commitment: Work on Sigma chain framework after 6.0 and sub-blocks
commitments.quote: so I think after 6.0 and sub-blocks, yeah, it would be a good time to work on that. So to have some framework like substrate

open_questions.question: Whether kushti will participate seriously in ErgoHack 9
open_questions.context: kushti will be traveling during ErgoHack for Cardano Summit and other events

open_questions.question: Whether fiat onramp will make progress on US listings by end of year
open_questions.context: Negotiations ongoing for onramp integration with native token support

open_questions.question: Status of BitGet listing
open_questions.context: Uncertainty about legitimacy of representatives and testing progress

key_facts.fact: No issues reported so far with 6.0 from testing
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: ErgoDevelopers group exists on Discord and Telegram, both are bridged
key_facts.speaker: kushti

key_facts.fact: Rosen called for final round of Ethereum testing, needs 30 plus people, going live in about two days
key_facts.speaker: qx()

key_facts.fact: Thai gold has different purity than LBMA gold - 96.5% vs 99.9%
key_facts.speaker: Dan Friedman

key_facts.fact: Bitcoin average daily volatility in 2022 is basically the same as back in 2013
key_facts.speaker: kushti
